text: Maxime Vachier-Lagrave (born 21 October 1990) is a French chess Grandmaster and the 2009 World Junior Chess Champion. MVL, as he is sometimes called, is at present their strongest player. == Grandmaster norms == He completed his final grandmaster norm in 2005, at 14 years, 4 months. He got his norms in these tournaments: *Paris Championship 2004: finished 3rd with 6½ points from nine rounds and a rating performance of 2703 *NAO GM Tournament 2004: won the tournament with 6/9 and got a performance of 2605 *GM Tournament of Évry: from 21 to 27 February 2005, finished second with 7½ and a performance of 2712 Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:French chess players Category:Sportspeople from Val-de-Marne
title: Maxime Vachier-Lagrave
